content_sections.content:
Learn how to format a number with two decimals in JavaScript.
Format a Number with Two Decimals
You can use the
toFixed()
method to format a 
number to only show two decimals. Note that the result is rounded (shows 5.57 instead of 5.56):
Example
let num = 5.56789;
let n = num.toFixed(2);  // 5.57

If you want to display three decimals, just change the number to 3:
Example
let num = 5.56789;
let n = num.toFixed(3);  // 5.568

Tip:
Learn more about the
toFixed()
method in our JavaScript Reference.
